title: (All Sold) Drum 350, Chase holding trophy- Lenox, Uzit...
author: Leon

posts.post_title: (All Sold) Drum 350, Chase holding trophy- Lenox, Uzit...
posts.post_content:
It's no secret these will be sold in our next auction, and are from my personal collection, UNLESS I get an offer that is good for me and a buyer before that. While I usually don't like the "make an offer" posts too much, in this case it makes some sense. Please PM me if interested in buying any of these beforehand...or you can wait and go to auction....The BL460 will probably stay in my collection for now....This Drum in a 2 holder should probably be resubmitted. When it was graded there were no half grades.......
All sold

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/st2063x.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/st2063xb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks Barry. I guess I can't follow rules very well. Alas, it is moved to this (correct) section.

All sold..


.yeah, nothing sells on the BST :)
Very nice!  Congrats on the sales Leon, I was contemplating making a run at that Chase if it went to auction.  But glad you got what you were looking for :cool:

When you have gold, it sells fast. ;)

Congrats on your sales. Nice cards.
Thank you for the pics Leon, super nice!!!

The new owners will enjoy them as much as I did. I am not one of the big whales so I have to reallocate my money sometimes. These are great cards that have nice attributes for the grades. I just wish I would have picked up more rare T206 backs when I started collecting.....Eventually I will end up with 3-4 T206s, the ones I enjoy the most.
